Data: Poverty and child poverty estimates

All in Excel / XLSX format

Three-year estimates as used in the report

  • Headline poverty estimates - data used for poverty and child poverty chapters
  • Poverty characteristics - data used for equality analysis chapter and more
  • Child poverty characteristics - data used for child poverty priority group analysis and more
  • Income analysis - data used for income and income inequality chapters

Single-year estimates

  • Poverty estimates (1-yr) - single-year estimates for the headline estimates including the child poverty update
  • Income analysis (1-yr) - single-year estimates for the income analysis
